naslov: PRODAJA - VILA S BAZENOM - 300m OD MORA - MURTER, BETINA (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: PRODAJA - VILA BETINA - 488m2, OKUĆNICA 1470m2 PREKRASAN POGLED NA MORE I STARI GRAD. Prodaje se vila na otoku Murteru u mjestu Betina. Murter je mostom spojen sa kopnom i samim tim vrlo dobro prometno povezan sa ostatkom obale. Vila se sastoji od: suterena, prizemlja i prvog kata. Suteren je predviđen kao jedinica za druženje (sauna, teretana, konoba, lounge, bazen i blagovaona). Prizemlje se sastoji od: dvije spavaće sobe, dnevni boravak, kuhinja, dvije kupaonice te dvije terase. Pvi kat se sastoji od: dvije spavaće sobe, dnevni boravak, kuhinja, kupaonica te dvije terase. Vila je izgrađena 2013g. Tijekom gradnje korišteni su materijali vrhunske kvalitete. Svi prilazi vili, kao i stubišta, rađeni su od prirodnog kamena. Kategorizirana sa 4 zvjezdice. Uhodan posao, popunjenost minimalno 6 mjeseci. Vila je kompletno uređena i opremljena, takva se i prodaje. Opremljenost: bazen, jacuzzi, fitness dvorana, lounge zona za druženje sa kominom, sauna, u dvorištu veliko dječije igralište. Predviđena je za cjelogodišnji boravak, opremljena plinskim centralnim grijanjem u svim prostorijama. Na ulazu u vilu nalazi se uređeni parking, natkriven prirodnim zelenilom. Okućnica je uređena autohtonim biljem, održavano i uređeno. Uz vilu je smještena još jedna vila, postoji mogućnost kupnje obje vile. Najbliža zračna luka je Zračna luka Zadar, do koje ima 82 km. Neposredna blizina ACI marine Više informacija na broj 0915539189. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar SALE - VILLA BETINA - 488m2 SEA AND CITY VIEW! We are selling a villa on the island of Murter at the scene of Betina. Murter is connected to the mainland by bridge and very well-connected to the rest of the coast. The villa consists of: Co-terrain, ground floor and first floor. The co-terrain is provided as a unit for association (sauna, gym, tavern, lounge, pool and dining room). Ground floor consists of: Two bedrooms, living room, kitchen, two bathrooms and two terraces. First floor consists of: Two bedrooms, living room, kitchen, bathroom and two terraces. The villa was built in 2011. Top quality materials were used during the construction. All approaches to the villa, as well as stairways, are made of natural stone. Categorized by four stars. Run-in business, occupancy minimum six months. The villa is fully furnished and equipped. Facilities: Swimming pool, Jacuzzi, fitness hall, lounge area with fireplace, sauna, courtyard, big children's playground. It is intended for a year-long stay as it is equipped with gas central heating at all premises. At the entrance to the villa there is a parking place. The bath is governed by indigenous plants. Next to this villa, there is another villa. There is a possibility of buying them together, as well. The nearest airport is Zadar Airport, up to which is 82 km. Immediate proximity to ACI marina. Contact: 0915539189. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar VERKAUF - VILLA Betina - 488m2 MEERES- UND STADTBLICK! Wir verkaufen eine Villa auf der Insel Murter in Betina. Murter ist mit der Brücke verbunden und sehr gut mit dem Rest der Küste verbunden. Die Villa besteht aus: Untergrund, Erdgeschoss und erster Stock. Die Untergrund ist zum Entspannen und Verbringen von Zeit mit Freunden vorgesehen (Sauna, Fitnessraum, Taverne, Lounge, Pool und Speisesaal). Erdgeschoss von: Zwei, Wohnzimmer, Küche, zwei und zwei Terrassen. Erster Stock von: Zwei, Wohnzimmer, Küche, Bad und zwei Terrassen. Die Villa wurde im 2011 gebaut. Hochwertige Materialien wurden während des Baus verwendet. All dies in der Villa, sowie Treppen, sind aus Naturstein. Kategorisiert nach vier Sternen. Run-in Geschäft, Belegung mindestens sechs Monate. Ausstattung: Schwimmbad, Jacuzzi, Fitnessraum, Lounge-Bereich mit Kamin, Sauna, große Spielplatz. Es ist für einen einjährigen Aufenthalt vorgesehen, mit Gaszentralheizung in allen Räumlichkeiten. An der Villa befindet sich einen Parkplatz. Neben dieser Villa gibt es eine weitere Villa. Es gibt auch eine Möglichkeit, in der sie zusammen gekauft werden. Der Flughafen ist der Flughafen Zadar, bis zu dem es 82 km sind. ACI marina. Kontakt: 0915539189. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o.
